text: Pedro Iturralde (3 July 1929 â€“ 1 November 2020) was a Spanish saxophonist, saxophone teacher and composer. He was born in Falces, Spain. He went on to lead his own jazz quartet at the W. Jazz Club in Madrid, experimenting with the combined use of flamenco and jazz. Iturralde died in Madrid on 1 November 2020 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish composers Category:Spanish musicians Category:Saxophonists Category:Spanish educators
title: Pedro Iturralde
